text:
M. S. Novik
September 10, 19%k
Harry:
Harold Hill some time ago reminded me of the
report to the FAE. I hope the enclosed does it.
Please feel free to rewrite it any way you
want. If for any reason you feel the rewrite should
be on my stationary, send it on to me and I will
have my office get it back to you at once.
An area that has as yet been untouched is
Ithe establishment of a relationship with the Musicians
Union. In the past there were too many black spots
the national music picture I am hope¬
ful that we can change this and get started with a
l new policy on the television stations.
Uni
f1
I hope to leave for the coast Monday or Tues¬
day of next week. For your information I will be
at the Ambassador.
MSN:ck
cc: Graydon Ausmus
SEP 1 3
